rows.label: qev092502_MSG0001
rows.name: The hell did you do, Lin?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0002
rows.name: I...I don't know! Just give me a second![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0003
rows.name: Ack![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0003_2
rows.name: I had the amp-furnace circuit in backwards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0004
rows.name:
I am SO sorry. I can't believe I'd do something
that dumb in the final check...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0005
rows.name: Oh, you're back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0006
rows.name: I take it you managed to gather the materials?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0006_2
rows.name: As you can see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0007
rows.name:
The test flight's gonna need to be postponed.
Maybe canceled entirely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0008
rows.name: Sorry for the bad news after all your hard work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0009
rows.name: No, wait![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0009_2
rows.name: I'll handle the repairs and resolve the final issues myself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0010
rows.name: Commander, please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0010_2
rows.name: I need this to work. I need to make it happen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0011
rows.name: It's the last homework assignment I'll ever have.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0012
rows.name: Please, sir. Let me complete it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0013
rows.name: Mmm... I understand where you're coming from, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0014
rows.name:
But it's not my call.
That last slip-up has the Sakuraba guys spooked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0015
rows.name:
The higher-ups aren't going to be happy
unless this thing can be mass-produced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0016
rows.name: But all my work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0018
rows.name: The apple really doesn't fall far from the tree.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0019
rows.name:
Don't worry about it, Vandham.
I'll convince my people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0020
rows.name:
I may just be a humble engineer,
but I've given my life to Sakuraba.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0021
rows.name: Let an old man cash in some of his favors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0022
rows.name: Thank you, Isobe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0023
rows.name:
Well that's one problem down.
But this death trap still needs a pilot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0024
rows.name:
After that little display before,
I doubt anyone'll be nuts enough to volunteer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0025
rows.name: You'd have to be reeeeal crazy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092502_SEL0011
rows.name: Volunteer to be the test pilot.

rows.label: qev092502_JNK0020
rows.name: Deflect

rows.label: qev092502_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Doug is the logical choice.

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0026
rows.name: Thank you so, so much! I swear I'll make this thing work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0027
rows.name: True, Doug would probably be willing to help, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0028
rows.name:
Honestly, after all we've been through together,
I'd really rather you do this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0029
rows.name:
Welp, you heard the girl.
Can't back out now that she put you on the spot, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0030
rows.name:
Now that THAT'S settled,
when can you have this bucket of bolts fixed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0031
rows.name: I'll have it ready by tomorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0032
rows.name:
All right, you've got till morning.
Past that, and I'll have to call it off for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0033
rows.name:
The higher-ups'll want to take another long look and
decide if this is still where they wanna spend their money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0034
rows.name: Understood. I won't let everyone's hard work go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0035_m
rows.name: And I won't let down my brave test pilot either. I swear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0035_f
rows.name: And I won't let down my brave test pilot either. I swear![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0036
rows.name: It's done. I did it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0037
rows.name: I swear it's totally safe and secure this time, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0038
rows.name:
We dreamed of a Skell that can fly through the air,
and now it's finally here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0039
rows.name: Looks that way to me. And trust me, I looked close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0040
rows.name: This thing should work. ...It better work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0041
rows.name: What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0041_2
rows.name: Ready to put your life in the hands of this thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_JNK0030
rows.name: Affirm

rows.label: qev092502_SEL0031
rows.name: Give a thumbs-up.

rows.label: qev092502_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev092502_SEL0041
rows.name: Say you're feeling pretty sleepy right now.

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0042
rows.name:
Thaaat's the spirit!
Should be a helluva view from up there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0043
rows.name: ...Assuming you get up there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0044
rows.name: It'll fly, jeez! Do you trust me on this or not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0045
rows.name: Oh, c'mon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0046
rows.name:
You're gonna go on a perfect test flight
and show all these nay-sayers what's up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0047
rows.name: Hey, nothing like blasting into the sky to wake a body up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0048
rows.name:
I'll stick with coffee myself.
Less chance of Lin killing me and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0049
rows.name: Don't count on that, buster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0050
rows.name:
Now get up there, have a perfect test flight,
and show all these nay-sayers what's up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0051
rows.name:
All right, let's get this party started.
Fly her to the specified point to start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0052
rows.name: It's a spot we haven't been able to reach before now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0053
rows.name: The perfect landing point for our test flight![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0054
rows.name: I thought so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0055
rows.name: We'll be monitoring your progress from here. Good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0056
rows.name: Oh, and whatever you do, don't damage the Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092502_MSG0057
rows.name: I think what you meant to say was "come home safe."[ST:wait ]
